languages.text: {n}Ликование оглушающим валом проходится по залу. Со всех сторон гремят крики, славящие вас и династию фон Валанциус. Октавиана подхватывает их, параллельно готовя бутылки и кружки, прекрасно представляя что произойдет как только вы покинете бар.{/n}

{n}A deafening wave of jubilation washes over the room. From every direction, you hear shouts of praise for you and House von Valancius. Octaviana joins in while readying bottles and tankards — she knows what will happen the moment you leave the bar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ликование оглушающим валом проходится по залу. Со всех сторон гремят крики, славящие вас и династию фон Валанциус. Октавиана подхватывает их, параллельно готовя бутылки и кружки, прекрасно представляя что произойдет как только вы покинете бар.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A deafening wave of jubilation washes over the room. From every direction, you hear shouts of praise for you and House von Valancius. Octaviana joins in while preparing bottles and mugs — she knows what will happen the moment you leave the bar.{/n}

{n}A deafening wave of jubilation washes over the room. From every direction, you hear shouts of praise for you and House von Valancius. Octaviana joins in while preparing bottles and mugs — she knows what will happen the moment you leave the bar.{/n}

{n}A deafening wave of jubilation washes over the room. From every direction, you hear shouts of praise for you and House von Valancius. Octaviana joins in while preparing bottles and mugs — she knows what will happen the moment you leave the bar.{/n}

{n}A deafening wave of jubilation washes over the room. From every direction, you hear shouts of praise for you and House von Valancius. Octaviana joins in while preparing bottles and mugs — she knows what will happen the moment you leave the bar.{/n}

{n}A deafening wave of jubilation washes over the room. From every direction, you hear shouts of praise for you and House von Valancius. Octaviana joins in while readying bottles and tankards — she knows what will happen the moment you leave the bar.{/n}

{n}A deafening wave of jubilation washes over the room. From every direction, you hear shouts of praise for you and House von Valancius. Octaviana joins in while readying bottles and tankards — she knows what will happen the moment you leave the bar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}耳をつんざくような歓声が部屋中に響き渡る。どの方向からも、あなたとフォン・ヴァランシウス家への称賛の叫びが聞こえてくる。ボトルとジョッキを用意しつつ、オクタヴィアナもそれに加わる…彼女はあなたが部屋を去った瞬間、何が起きるかわかっているのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A deafening wave of jubilation washes over the room. From every direction, you hear shouts of praise for you and House von Valancius. Octaviana joins in while readying bottles and tankards — she knows what will happen the moment you leave the bar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}耳をつんざくような歓声が部屋中に響き渡る。どの方向からも、あなたとフォン・ヴァランシウス家への称賛の叫びが聞こえてくる。ボトルとジョッキを用意しつつ、オクタヴィアナもそれに加わる…彼女はあなたが部屋を去った瞬間、何が起きるかわかっているのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une vague assourdissante d'allégresse envahit la pièce. De toutes les directions, vous entendez des acclamations glorifiant la maison von Valancius et vous-même. Octaviana se joint à eux, tout en préparant des bouteilles et des verres ; elle sait exactement ce qui suivra votre sortie du bar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A deafening wave of jubilation washes over the room. From every direction, you hear shouts of praise for you and House von Valancius. Octaviana joins in while readying bottles and tankards — she knows what will happen the moment you leave the bar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une vague assourdissante d'allégresse envahit la pièce. De toutes les directions, vous entendez des acclamations glorifiant la maison von Valancius et vous-même. Octaviana se joint à eux, tout en préparant des bouteilles et des verres ; elle sait exactement ce qui suivra votre sortie du bar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}震耳欲聋的欢庆浪潮席卷了整个房间，四面八方都传来了赞美声，夸赞着你和冯·瓦兰修斯家族。奥克塔维娜一边加入了欢庆，一边忙着准备酒杯和酒瓶。她已经预料到了你一离开酒吧，就会发生什么样的事情。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A deafening wave of jubilation washes over the room. From every direction, you hear shouts of praise for you and House von Valancius. Octaviana joins in while readying bottles and tankards — she knows what will happen the moment you leave the bar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}震耳欲聋的欢庆浪潮席卷了整个房间，四面八方都传来了赞美声，夸赞着你和冯·瓦兰修斯家族。奥克塔维娜一边加入了欢庆，一边忙着准备酒杯和酒瓶。她已经预料到了你一离开酒吧，就会发生什么样的事情。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine ohrenbetäubende Jubelwelle schwappt durch den Raum. Aus allen Richtungen hörst du Lobpreisungen für dich und das Haus von Valancius. Octaviana stimmt mit ein, während sie Flaschen und Krüge vorbereitet – sie weiß, was passieren wird, sobald du die Bar verlässt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A deafening wave of jubilation washes over the room. From every direction, you hear shouts of praise for you and House von Valancius. Octaviana joins in while readying bottles and tankards — she knows what will happen the moment you leave the bar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine ohrenbetäubende Jubelwelle schwappt durch den Raum. Aus allen Richtungen hörst du Lobpreisungen für dich und das Haus von Valancius. Octaviana stimmt mit ein, während sie Flaschen und Krüge vorbereitet – sie weiß, was passieren wird, sobald du die Bar verlässt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Toda la gente de alrededor comienza a gritar de alegría. Desde todas direcciones, escuchas vítores alabándote a ti y a la casa von Valancius. Octaviana se une a la celebración mientras prepara botellas y jarras, pues sabe qué ocurrirá cuando salgas del bar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A deafening wave of jubilation washes over the room. From every direction, you hear shouts of praise for you and House von Valancius. Octaviana joins in while readying bottles and tankards — she knows what will happen the moment you leave the bar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Toda la gente de alrededor comienza a gritar de alegría. Desde todas direcciones, escuchas vítores alabándote a ti y a la casa von Valancius. Octavia se une a la celebración mientras prepara botellas y tazas, pues sabe qué ocurrirá cuando salgas del bar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sağır edici bir coşku dalgası odayı sarıyor. Her yandan tezahüratla sana ve von Valancius Hanesi'ne övgüler düzülüyor. Şişeleri ve kupaları hazırlarken Octaviana da onlara katılıyor. Sen bardan çıkar çıkmaz neler olacağını iyi biliyor sonuçta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A deafening wave of jubilation washes over the room. From every direction, you hear shouts of praise for you and House von Valancius. Octaviana joins in while readying bottles and tankards — she knows what will happen the moment you leave the bar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Odayı, sağır edici bir coşku dalgası sarıyor. Her yandan tezahüratla sana ve von Valancius Hanesi'ne övgüler düzülüyor. Şişeleri ve maşrapaları hazırlarken Octaviana da onlara katılıyor... Sen bardan çıkar çıkmaz neler olacağını çok iyi biliyor.{/n}
